# @svgr/babel-plugin-replace-jsx-attribute-value

## Install

```
npm install --save-dev @svgr/babel-plugin-replace-jsx-attribute-value
```

## Usage

**.babelrc**

```json
{
  "plugins": [
    [
      "@svgr/babel-plugin-replace-jsx-attribute-value",
      {
        "values": [
          { "value": "#000", "newValue": "#fff" ***REMOVED***,
          { "value": "blue", "newValue": "props.color", "literal": true ***REMOVED***
        ]
      ***REMOVED***
    ]
  ]
***REMOVED***
```
